paper_keywords: Sobolev space with bounded mixed derivative
paper_abstract: We study the information-based complexity of the approximation problem on the multivariate Sobolev space with bounded mixed derivative MWp,alpha r in the norm of L-q by linear Monte Carlo methods. Applying the Maiorov's discretization technique and some properties of pseudo-s-scale, we determine the exact orders of this problem for 1 < p, q < infinity. (C) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The complexity of function approximation on Sobolev spaces with bounded mixed derivative by linear Monte Carlo methods
